'''Netflix''' is an American streaming service, enabling immediate access to a wide library of films and TV show under a subscription.

== Releases ==

=== ''Minecraft: Story Mode'' ===
{{Main|Minecraft: Story Mode}}
''Minecraft: Story Mode'' was an interactive special specifically created for Netflix's streaming service. It was based on the season one of the Telltale version. On December 5, 2022, it was delisted and unviewable.

=== Animated series ===
{{Main|Minecraft Animated Series}}Announced coming off the trails of the [[15 Days of Minecraft]] event, an animated series based off ''Minecraft'' will be animated by [[WildBrain Studios]] and released on Netflix at an unspecified time.<ref name="mcnetarticle">{{Mcnet|netflix-series|<nowiki>Netflix + Minecraft = <3</nowiki>|May 30, 2024|Per Landin}}</ref>

== Collaborations ==

=== Stranger Things Skin Pack ===
{{Main|Stranger Things Skin Pack}}As a promotion for the show's second season, a skin pack based off the Netflix original series {{Wikipedia|Stranger Things}} was released on October 27, 2017 for {{BE}} and {{LCE}}, as well as September 19, 2018 for [[New Nintendo 3DS Edition|''New Nintendo 3DS Edition'']].
